description: Adds or subtracts a number of days to an existing date.

properties.name: year
properties.label: Year
properties.description: Provide the year of the date.

properties.name: month
properties.label: Month
properties.description: Provide the month of the date.

properties.name: day
properties.label: Day
properties.description: Provide the day of the date.

properties.name: today
properties.label: Today
properties.description: Check if you want to set todays date

properties.name: outprop
properties.label: Output Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the output property which contains the date.
